header.title: Car Service
header.desc: Now hassle-free and reliable car service in Bangalore right at your doorstep.
header.sub-desc: Automovill care for your car the way you do. And we provide the best car service with skilled technicians, auto-experts, and use automated tools and machinery.

content.title: Benefit OF Car Service with Automovill

convenienceAndRelief: No need to step out. Car service right at your doorstep
Quick Delivery as we understand your busy schedule and value of time
absoluteHonesty: With our open procedures and real-time information
Complete analysis and genuine spare parts
qualityControl: Greatest auto servicing experience by using authentic spare parts

questions.question: Which Engine oil do you use for Standard Service and Comprehensive Service?
questions.answer: We generally use Total engine oil with the grades 10W30 for mineral and 5W40/5W30 for synthetic. However for specific needs we do change oil brands as well. Automovill has pan-India tie up with all major oil brands.

questions.question: How much time does it take to get my General Service done?
questions.answer: Including pick up and drop, it takes 6 hours to get the general service of a car done. It also includes a high-quality car-wash with interior vacuuming and dashboard polishing.

questions.question: Any extra charges apart from the mentioned charges in the Services Page?
questions.answer: There is no change in the prices that are mentioned in the Services Page. The prices are GST-inclusive. For any additional work or cost that we may come across while inspecting your car, we shall notify you for your consent before proceeding with that work.

questions.question: Do I get any warranty for the Service that’s done?
questions.answer: You get 6 months or 5000 KMs (whichever is earlier) warranty for any part which is replaced.

questions.question: What if there are issues after servicing i.e. ‘post-service’?
questions.answer: Automovill attends to and solves any issue which is found ‘post-service’. You are eligible for a free inspection post service-completion or if any issue is found ‘post-service’.

header.title: Denting and Painting Services
header.desc: Fixing dents and scratches on the car is an art in which we have mastered ourselves.

prepanel.title: Per Panel Painting
list: Painting as per the Standard Code

fullbody.title: Full Body Painting
list: Painting as per the Standard Code/ Multiple coats
Dickey Floor & Dickey door inside Painting

content.title: What includes in Denting and Painting Service?
items: Remove the welds left over after the use of dent puller

content.title: Why Choose Automovill for Denting/Painting Service?

questions.question: Do I get a warranty on denting/painting service?
questions.answer: Yes. You are eligible for 2 years of paint-warranty for any denting & painting service that is done by Automovill. Additionally, Automovill gives 1 year of Rust-Free warranty on the work done.

questions.question: Can you match the Paint Colour Exactly to My Car?
questions.answer: Yes, Automovill uses the exact color code which is mentioned in the RC copy of the car (when painting is done in the car). However, we do see a slight mismatch in case the color on the non-painted panels is faded already. In order to match, Automovill provides complementary polishing of the car after every painting.

questions.question: How much time does Denting & Painting take (for Panel/ Full-body Paint) ?
questions.answer: For the painting process to be fool-proof it takes a minimum of 14 hours (as it includes - surfacing, putty work, coat 1-2-3, polishing, washing). We need to keep a minimum of 3 hours for drying with natural light for the color to exactly match. For full-body painting, it takes 7-10 working days because we remove the seats, mats, and other accessories from the car before painting as a hygiene-measure.

questions.question: Do you provide this service under Insurance?
questions.answer: Automovill has tie-ups with all major insurance-providers for all accidental repair.

questions.question: Does Alloy-Wheel painting get covered in these Packages?
questions.answer: Alloy-wheel painting is not a part of the car-body painting. It has an additional cost.

questions.question: Should I go with Solid Painting or Metallic Painting?
questions.answer: We shall proceed as per the color code mentioned in the RC of the car. Alternatively, we can discuss the mode of painting first and can decide on the color & type of paint. Please call us at +917353600400 to discuss with us.
